title: Laplace VIRS (Europa Ganymede) Short Term Funding
abstractText: This work will be aimed at developing the basic concept of the VIRS instrument for the upcoming Cosmic Vision LaPlace mission to the Jupiter system, by investigations into the design of the optical system and investigations of surface reflectace spectra.
impactText: Used to leverage involvement in the JANUS instrument for JUICE and the development of CCD activities in the UK for this instrument. Electronics,Other Economic
findingsText: Development of proposal for involvement in imager for JUICE. Future science involvement in JANUS science exploitation for the JUICE mission. Other
